pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Multivariate Event Times // Implementation of various statistical models for multivariate event history data doi:10.1007/s10985-013-9244-x. Including multivariate cumulative incidence models doi:10.1002/sim.6016, and bivariate random effects probit models (Liability models) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2015.01.014. Also contains two-stage binomial modelling that can do pairwise odds-ratio dependence modelling based marginal logistic regression models. This is an alternative to the alternating logistic regression approach (ALR).
